The company enjoys global prominence and recognition in the exhibition industry and is the worlds largest trade fair organizer. It is a state-owned organization with 60% owned by the City of Frankfurt and 40% by the State of Hesse. Messe Frankfurt has its own exhibition complex to conduct their notable exhibitions and boasts of having an international network of 52 global Sales Partners five branch offices and 28 subsidiaries. With an impressive portfolio of highly successful trade shows and events in Germany and other countries the Messe Frankfurt Exhibition GmbH has been critically acclaimed for organizing these events with finesse. Premier trade shows such as Ambiente, Beauty world, Christmas world including other have been efficiently organized by Messe Frankfurt.

name: Mattfeldt & Singer Marketing and Fair AG
description: Trade fairs are still an important marketing tool. For more than 20 years, fairs have been our profession. With more than 60 trade fairs a year, no one organizes regional fairs any more than we do. From Mattfeldt & Sänger, an advertising agency founded in Munich in 1990, Mattfeldt & Sänger Marketing und Messe AG was founded in 1999 as a trade fair organizer based in the Allgäu region. Initially specializing in energy, construction & real estate exhibitions, over the years we have been involved in fairs around health, wellness & sports, job & career, women's fairs and consumer shows. The innovative trade fair offer is developed as a team depending on the market situation and needs. Since 2006, we have been offering our customers a full-service offer for our trade fair appearance via our own exhibition construction department. We stand for trade fairs with a regional orientation. For us, quality means satisfied exhibitors, partners and visitors. Our almost 40 employees have the experience of more than 800 trade fairs.

The exhibition area covers 110000 square metres and all 19 fair halls are directly linked to each other.This top-class fair venue has enjoyed steady development. For example turnover has doubled in the last 10 years. MESSE ESSEN is situated in the region in Germany with the strongest economy and highest population. It is central and easy to reach. Every year up to 2 million visitors come to Essen from roughly 100 countries to maintain contacts and forge new ones. MESSE ESSEN ranks among the best fair venues with the most visitors and is in the top ten in Germany.
